revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: The 18th year of Lucius Septimius Severus Pertinax and Marcus Aurelius Antoninus and Publius Septimius Geta Pii Augusti, from Ploutas son of S-- and the associate sitologoi of the village of Tebtunis. There were measured to us on the 3rd of the month Pauni from the produce of the said year by smoothed public measure to the credit of Petesouchos, locksmith, through cultivators of public lands four and three thirds and an eighth artabas of wheat, and on the 2nd of the month Epeiph by the same person through Papos, grain-measurer, for government dues four more artabas of wheat, total for the receipt 8 2/3 1/8 (artabas) of wheat. Also on the nineteenth three and a twelfth more artabas of barley, total 3 1/12 art. (2nd hand?) I, Ploutas, have measured 11 1/2 1/3 1/24 artabas of grain as stated above.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., II.367 On line 23 see BL v. 1, p. 427.
